question: Question_01_(a)
sols:
swap row 3 to row 1 and row 1 to row 2

$\begin{vmatrix}
0 & 0 &1 \\
1 & 0 & 0\\
0 &1 &0
\end{vmatrix}\begin{vmatrix}
2 & 3 &4 \\
1& 1 & 1\\
0 &0 &1
\end{vmatrix}$

row2 â row2 (-1/2)row1

$\begin{vmatrix}
0 &0 &1 \\
1 & 0 & 0\\
0&1 &0
\end{vmatrix}\begin{vmatrix}
1 &0 & 0\\
1/2& 1 &0 \\
0& 0 &1
\end{vmatrix}
\begin{vmatrix}
2 &3 &4 \\
0&-1/2 &-1 \\
0&0 &1
\end{vmatrix}$

PA = LU

\end{vmatrix}
\begin{vmatrix}
